summary: A utility class that automatically selects and loads an appropriate Flax masked language model based on a model name or configuration, providing ready‑to‑use masked token prediction capabilities in JAX/Flax environments.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly integrate pretrained masked language models for NLP tasks such as fill‑in‑the‑blank or token prediction, without manually handling model architecture selection or loading, thereby accelerating development and fine‑tuning workflows in Flax.
